a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Genuine saving per capita and GDP per capita, United Kingdom
GDP, gross domestic product, represents a nation's total income. Genuine Savings = net fixed produced
capital formation and overseas investment + change in natural capital + education expenditure.
Note: This data is adjusted for differences in the cost of living between countries, and for inflation. It is measured in constant 1990
